subject: Rajasthan Culture
question_en: What was the name of Maharana Pratap's famous horse?
question_hi: Maharana Pratap ke prasiddh ghode ka naam kya tha?
explanation_en: Chetak was Maharana Pratap's famed warhorse, renowned for its bravery at the Battle of Haldighati.
explanation_hi: चेतक महाराणा प्रताप का प्रसिद्ध घोड़ा था, जो हल्दीघाटी की लड़ाई में अपनी वीरता के लिए जाना जाता है।

subject: Rajasthan Culture
question_en: Who founded the city of Jaipur?
question_hi: Jaipur nagar ki sthapna kisne ki?
explanation_en: Jaipur was founded in 1727 by Maharaja Sawai Jai Singh II, also known as the 'Star King'.
explanation_hi: जैपुर 1727 में महाराजा सवाई जय सिंह द्वितीय द्वारा स्थापित किया गया, जिन्हें 'स्टार किंग' के रूप में भी जाना जाता है।

subject: Rajasthan Culture
question_en: Which ruler founded the city of Udaipur?
question_hi: Udaipur nagar ki sthaapna kisne ki?
